ComicInfo.Summary:
Celebrate the 50th-issue milestone of IDW's ongoing Uncle Scrooge title with the conclusion of the four-part story "Under Siege"! With the Beagle Boys and Magica De Spell causing no end of headaches for Uncle Scrooge and his friends and family, will the bad guys finally win-or will a little help come from some unexpected sources to turn the tide? Then, in "My Best Friend: Loyal for Life," find out why Quackmore and Uncle Scrooge have such a strong and unwavering bond. That's two stories highlighting everyone's favorite miserly duck, so join in the fun with the citizens of Duckburg in a salute to Uncle Scrooge!
Special 50th issue of IDW's ongoing Uncle Scrooge series!
Features two original covers from celebrated Disney artist Andrea Freccero!
Story TitlesUnder Siege! Part 4 (from Italian Topolino #3227, 2017)My Best Friend: Loyal for Life (from Italian Topolino #3196, 2017)*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Andrea Freccero (a) & Fabio Lo Monaco (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Andrea Freccero (a) & Marco Colleti (c) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 19:07:41. [CVDB726669]

ComicInfo.Colorist: Disney Italia, Fabio Lo Monaco, Marco Colleti
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Amauri Osorio, Andrea Freccero, Fabio Lo Monaco, Marco Colleti
ComicInfo.Editor: Chris Cerasi, Denton J. Tipton, Elizabeth Brei
ComicInfo.Characters: Albert Quackmore, Donald Duck, Fethry Duck, Grandpa Beagle, Gyro Gearloose, Magica De Spell, Pig Mayor, Rockerduck, The Helper, Uncle Scrooge
